Texts.Eng: A protector to slaughter, just for me! This will be a crowning achievement; today my legend grows ever larger!
And so the hero arrives! Brave and foolish, my favourite type. I will break you and relish every moment of it.
I'll slaughter you and use your loot to replace the guards you killed!
My, my! If a protector feels the need to challenge me, I must be doing something right. Step up and lend your head to one of my many pikes.
